Saves a Spark DataFrame as a Spark table

Saves a Spark DataFrame and as a Spark table.

spark_save_table(x, path, mode = NULL, options = list())

Arguments

x
A Spark DataFrame or dplyr operation
path
The path to the file. Needs to be accessible from the cluster. Supports the "hdfs://", "s3n://" and "file://" protocols.
mode
Specifies the behavior when data or table already exists.
options
A list of strings with additional options.

See also

Other Spark serialization routines: spark_load_table, spark_read_csv, spark_read_jdbc, spark_read_json, spark_read_parquet, spark_read_table, spark_write_csv, spark_write_json, spark_write_parquet, spark_write_table
